about_the_game:
Survivors of the once-great city of Hragejk now roam the lands donning an armour of everburning red and white-hot “Ember Crown” - markings left to remind passerbies one shall never defy the mighty Ul-Hrag.

The Ember Crown Bundle includes the full game Century: Age of Ashes and extra rewards:
  • 1 Marauder Legendary Dragon
  • 1 Marauder Legendary Rider Item Set
  • 1 Legendary Player Icon
  • 1,000 Gems
detailed_description:
Survivors of the once-great city of Hragejk now roam the lands donning an armour of everburning red and white-hot “Ember Crown” - markings left to remind passerbies one shall never defy the mighty Ul-Hrag.

The Ember Crown Bundle includes the full game Century: Age of Ashes and extra rewards:
  • 1 Marauder Legendary Dragon
  • 1 Marauder Legendary Rider Item Set
  • 1 Legendary Player Icon
  • 1,000 Gems

name: Century - Ember Crown Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Survivors of the once-great city of Hragejk now roam the lands donning an armour of everburning red and white-hot “Ember Crown” - markings left to remind passerbies one shall never defy the mighty Ul-Hrag.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Japanese
